messages.name: Xavier
messages.message: Hey Joanna!! Let me know when you get this message.

messages.name: Joanna
messages.message: Sup pup, Got the message but waiting on Mackenzie.

messages.name: Mackenzie
messages.message: Don't wait for me Joanna. Do what you got to do. I am with Gunter.

messages.name: Gunter
messages.message: You are not with me.. Why you got to lie like that?
